content.rendered:
Our Team

The Team Behind the Show!

Our Team Comprises of Esteemed members of Film and TV Industries who have significant contributions over the years. These hand picked people have banded together to make this night unforgettable

Mr. Ayub Khan

Founder & Festival Organiser

The founder

Mr. AYUB KHAN is an award winning  director , he got many awards for his short film “Family first”, he has started his journey  as an Exhibitor in 1981 with a Movie ‘Naseeb’ , the film was a big hit because of its Grand Star cast. He kept on working as an Exhibitor for some time and was a part of many big Movies like Kranti, Silsila, and Nikah. In1985 he started working as a Distributor with the movie ‘Triveni’ starring Raj Babbar, Rati Agnihotri, Suresh Oberoi and Shakti Kapoor. In 1988 he enterd  into the field of Direction, where he got a chance to work with Gulzar Shahab in the movie ‘Leebas’ and then TV show  ‘Mirza Galib’  His hard work in the early stages of his career showcased his talent on some very hit projects during the year 1990-2000 like; ‘Apradhinee’ with Mr Vinod Sharma as Producer / Director and Star Actress Ranjeeta (known for Laila-Majnu) in a double role. Mr.khan also associated with , Zee TV show ‘Banegi Apni Baat,’ Interestingly, R Madhavan made his debut in the film industry with this show. After this he work in the movie Titled “Andha Inteqam” and “Zameer ki Awaz” both with Mr Swaroop Kumar. ‘Agni Morcha,’ which starred legendary actors like Dharmendra, In the year 2000, he made movies like “Jahan tum le Chalo” – as Production designer, “Be-lagaam” –  As Story & Executive Producer, “Mussa – The Most Wanted” – as Creative Director…..

Read More
Ayub Khan

Mr khan felt he should also upgrade his process & techniques of working to start flowing with the system and that is how E4U ENTERPRISES was founded and registered under the label of Distribution and Production Company. Company has released films like  Murder Madhuri, Yeh toh  tow much hoga and dare you and many more in the pipe line  3 Dev starer Kaykay menon, Prosenojit, kar Ets.

E4U ENTERPRISES has hosted many Entertainment events as well and has created platforms for the Up comers and has made a name for itself in the industry by encouraging and launching Fresh talents and making a Roof for actors and artists new in the industry. In the last few years, E4U ENTERPRISES has become the most looked-after production house, because we are able to generate some extraordinary talents who are constantly aiming to create special standards in the Indian film industry.

Sayeed Ahmad

Director – Sky News India/Organiser

The Organiser

Sayeed Ahmad serves as the director of ALISEMED PHARMA Pvt Ltd and THE SQUARE GROUP, which is a conglomerate involved in property and construction. In addition to his corporate responsibilities, he actively engages in the fields of lecturing and entertainment. Sayeed Ahmad is also affiliated with SKY ENTERTAINMENT and holds the position of Director at SKY NEWS INDIA, a company renowned for its YouTube program “AAP SE AAP TAK.” Known for his visionary approach and simplicity, Sayeed Ahmad has been leading SKY NEWS INDIA since its establishment in 2016. Notably, he is poised to explore film production under the SKY ENTERTAINMENT banner. His varied interests and contributions portray him as a dynamic and versatile individual with roots in Prayagraj (Allahabad)

Shahmir Khan

Actor

Event Director

Renowned TV Actor , who started his career as an assitant director / writer in the Indian Film Industry, is currently winning accolades for his impeccable performances in all the projects he takes up as an actor. A film making and theatre student, coming from Delhi and making a mark on his own merits, Shahmir adds that extra zest as he relates to the struggles of a budding film maker.

Event Team

Sanjay Shubhankar

Writer/Director

Creative Director & Consultant

Sanjay Shubhankar, a distinguished alumnus and Gold Medalist from Bharatendu Academy of Dramatic Arts (BNA), is not just a Creative Consultant and Director but a beacon of promise in the world of writing, directing, and storytelling. With unwavering dedication to theater and films, Mr. Shubhankar has graced the Rapa Award jury twice and has been a valued member of juries for numerous drama competitions and short film festivals. His journey is an inspiration, embodying the transformative power of passion and commitment in the creative realm.

Himanshu Jhunjhunwala

PRO – Dwaper Promoters

P.R.O

Himanshu Jhunjhunwala is One of the Senior Most Pros Working in Bollywood. Been Public Relation Officer for More Than 5000 Projects, Which Comprise of Movies (More Than 500), Music Albums (More Than 500), Events (More Than 3000). Working Since 1997 and Being the Public Relation Officer for Numerous Block Buster Music Videos, Grand Events and Long Chain of Movies Make Him the Most Successful and Busiest Pro Currently Existing in Bollywood. Despite This, He Has Also Been Pro for Many a Big Guns of Bollywood Like Late Ravindra Jain, Dr. L. Subramaniam, Kavita Krishnamurthy, Late Aadesh Srivastav, Himesh Reshamiya, Mika Singh, Mithoon and many more

P.R.O (Print Media)

Indra Mohan Pannu

Senior Journalist

Website & Publicity Design

ravnskill.in

Development and Marketing Agency
